title: Just found an AI that messages me first everyday
summary: Tried chatGPT tasks but it doesn't fit my workflow, so I've been lurking around for an AI for ADHD. Recently found this thing called saner.ai, it literally messages me first every morning to check in on my tasks lol...
content: Tried chatGPT tasks but it doesn't fit my workflow, so I've been lurking around for an AI for ADHD. Recently found this thing called saner.ai, it literally messages me first every morning to check in on my tasks lol
